thread.title: BRIEF-Vanadiumcorp Resources And Electrochem Technologies & Materials Filed International PCT Patent Application

title: BRIEF-Vanadiumcorp Resources And Electrochem Technologies & Materials Filed International PCT Patent Application
text: February 28, 2018 / 2:40 PM / Updated 20 minutes ago BRIEF-Vanadiumcorp Resources And Electrochem Technologies & Materials Filed International PCT Patent Application Reuters Staff Feb 28 (Reuters) - Vanadiumcorp Resource Inc: * VANADIUMCORP RESOURCES INC. AND ELECTROCHEM TECHNOLOGIES & MATERIALS INC. FILED INTERNATIONAL PCT PATENT APPLICATION * VANADIUMCORP RESOURCE - CO,‍ELECTROCHEM JOINTLY FILED FOR INTERNATIONAL PATENT APPLICATION UNDER PATENT COOPERATION TREATY (PERCENT) ON FEB 21 * VANADIUMCORP RESOURCE - FILED PATENT TO‍ SECURE IP RIGHTS FOR NEW VANADIUMCORP-ELECTROCHEM TECHNOLOGY WORLDWIDE.​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
